title: How Vikings coach Kevin O'Connell built a support system to 'empower' Kirk Cousins
description: O'Connell's approach to "building people" has spurred one of the most effective seasons of Cousins' 11-year NFL career.

title: Commanders seek 'fresh start' at OC, fire Turner
description: The Washington Commanders fired offensive coordinator Scott Turner on Tuesday, the team announced.

title: Lions GM: Goff proved he's starting QB for us
description: Detroit Lions general manager Brad Holmes said the team would make sure "every stone is turned" as they prepare for the draft, but said Jared Goff proved to everyone that "he's the starting quarterback for us."

title: Poles: Must be 'blown away' to draft QB at No. 1
description: Chicago Bears general manager Ryan Poles said he would have to be "absolutely blown away" to draft a quarterback with the team's first pick and indicated that Justin Fields would be the starter next season.

title: Source: Ravens, LB Smith agree to extension
description: The Ravens and Pro Bowl middle linebacker Roquan Smith reached an agreement on a five-year extension on Tuesday, a team source confirmed. The NFL Network is reporting the deal is worth $100 million.

title: Jones: 'Complete confidence' in McCarthy, staff
description: Cowboys owner Jerry Jones said Tuesday that Mike McCarthy's job is not on the line when they face Tom Brady and the Bucs in an NFC wild-card game Monday.

title: Colts GM admits failures, focuses on QB stability
description: Colts GM Chris Ballard acknowledged criticism of his decisions, saying "I failed," and he reckoned with the challenges facing the team this offseason.

title: Chargers' Slater to make practice return, out Sat.
description: Chargers LT Rashawn Slater, who has been on IR since suffering a torn biceps tendon in Week 3, will return to practice but won't play vs. the Jaguars.

title: Texans' Cooks: Don't want to be part of a rebuild
description: Brandin Cooks says he's not going into the offseason thinking, "I want to be part of a rebuild," he told reporters Monday.

title: The backup blueprint: What 49ers' Brock Purdy must do to join championship QB fraternity
description: As Purdy starts his quest to lead the 49ers to a Super Bowl title, former backups give their tips to navigating a championship contender.

title: Pressure on New York Jets GM Joe Douglas to formulate winning QB plan
description: Douglas hasn't solved the Jets' QB woes after four years on the job. He isn't giving up on Zach Wilson but won't rule out acquiring a veteran, either.

title: Panthers owner David Tepper must make 'incredible' head coach hire
description: The pressure is on after Carolina has gone 29-53 since Tepper purchased the team in 2018.

title: Why all 14 NFL playoff teams will go on a Super Bowl run -- or go home early: Our first look at the bracket
description: The NFL playoff field is finally set, and an exciting wild-card slate lies ahead. Here's your guide to everything you need to know about the 14 teams vying to win Super Bowl LVII.

title: Now in full reset mode, Cardinals need new braintrust that meshes with Kyler Murray
description: The priorities for Arizona's new GM and coach? Bring stability and build a strong relationship with Murray, their franchise quarterback.

title: Every NFL team's record vs. the spread: Final edition
description: How all 32 NFL teams have fared against the spread, and their over/unders this season.

title: Here are the 2023 regular-season opponents for every NFL team
description: If your team didn't make the playoffs, it's time to look ahead. Here's are the 2023 opponents for all 32 teams.

title: Aaron Rodgers leads list of players on the fantasy hot seat for 2023
description: As we head into the fantasy offseason, Eric discusses which players will have something to prove to fantasy managers in 2023.

title: Early fantasy football flex and superflex rankings for 2023
description: Whenever you decide to dive into your 2023 fantasy football draft prep, we've got you covered here with rankings updated throughout the offseason.

title: Tracking NFL head-coach firings: Five jobs open heading into offseason
description: Here's everything you need to know about the latest NFL head-coach movement, with news on open jobs.

title: Who should fill vacancies? Try our NFL head-coach carousel
description: Which candidate is a match for each position? Pair Sean Payton, DeMeco Ryans and others with a team.
